item.title: The Motivational Dimensions of RoboMaster
item.description: Evaluating the Motivational Dimensions of the STEM Learning Experiences with a Robot # In 2018, as the learning experience designer and engineer at DJI, I led the launch of RoboMaster S1(RMS1), a STEM educational robot.
